channel.title: Fire22 Dashboard - Error Code Registry
channel.description: Real-time updates for Fire22 Dashboard error codes, system alerts, and troubleshooting information
channel.generator: Fire22 Dashboard Error Code System v1.0.0

item.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E1001 - SYSTEM_INIT_FAILED
item.description:
System Initialization Failed

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 500

Description: Core system components failed to initialize properly during application startup.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Insufficient system resources (memory, disk space)
  • Missing or corrupted configuration files
  • Failed dependency injection
  • Database connection failure during startup
  • Missing environment variables

💡 Solutions:

  • Check system resources: free -m && df -h
  • Verify configuration files syntax and completeness
  • Review system logs: journalctl -u fire22-dashboard
  • Validate environment variables: bun run env:validate
  • Test database connectivity before startup

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag

📚 Documentation: System Troubleshooting Guide
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🟡 ERROR: E1002 - MEMORY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
item.description:
Memory Limit Exceeded

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 507

Description: Application exceeded allocated memory limits, which can cause system instability.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Memory leak in application code
  • Insufficient memory allocation
  • Large dataset processing without pagination
  • Recursive functions causing stack overflow
  • Unoptimized database queries loading too much data

💡 Solutions:

  • Increase memory allocation in configuration
  • Implement memory profiling: bun run profile:memory
  • Optimize data processing with streaming/pagination
  • Review and optimize database queries
  • Monitor with: bun run monitor:memory

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🟡 ERROR: E1003 - DIRECTORY_NOT_FOUND
item.description:
Required Directory Not Found

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 404

Description: System cannot locate required directory path, preventing file operations.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Directory path does not exist in filesystem
  • Incorrect relative or absolute path configuration
  • Directory was moved or deleted
  • Insufficient filesystem permissions
  • Case-sensitive filesystem path mismatch

💡 Solutions:

  • Verify directory exists: ls -la /path/to/directory
  • Check working directory: pwd
  • Create missing directory: mkdir -p /path/to/directory
  • Check permissions: ls -ld /path/to/directory
  • Use absolute paths instead of relative paths

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E2001 - DB_CONNECTION_FAILED
item.description:
Database Connection Failed

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to establish connection to database server, preventing all data operations.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Database server is down or unreachable
  • Invalid connection string or credentials
  • Network connectivity issues
  • Firewall blocking database port
  • Database server resource exhaustion

💡 Solutions:

  • Check database status: bun run health:database
  • Test connection: bun run test:db-connection
  • Verify network connectivity: ping db-host.fire22.ag
  • Check firewall rules and ports
  • Monitor database resources

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | ops-manager@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🟡 ERROR: E2002 - DB_QUERY_TIMEOUT
item.description:
Database Query Timeout

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 504

Description: Database query exceeded maximum execution time, indicating performance issues.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Inefficient or unoptimized queries
  • Missing database indexes
  • Large dataset operations without pagination
  • Database server resource contention
  • Network latency issues

💡 Solutions:

  • Analyze query performance: EXPLAIN ANALYZE
  • Add proper indexes for frequently queried columns
  • Implement query pagination for large datasets
  • Monitor database performance: bun run monitor:db
  • Optimize slow queries in query log

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: ⚠️ WARNING: E3001 - API_UNAUTHORIZED
item.description:
Unauthorized API Request

Department: Technology Department 💻 | Customer Support 🎧

Severity: WARNING

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Request lacks valid authentication credentials or token has expired.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Missing or invalid API key/token
  • Expired authentication token
  • Incorrect authentication header format
  • Revoked or suspended credentials
  • Clock skew causing token validation failure

💡 Solutions:

  • Verify API key: curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $TOKEN"
  • Check token expiration and refresh if needed
  • Ensure proper header format: Authorization: Bearer [token]
  • Synchronize system clocks with NTP
  • Contact admin if credentials are suspended

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | support@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: ⚠️ WARNING: E3002 - API_RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
item.description:
API Rate Limit Exceeded

Department: Technology Department 💻

Severity: WARNING

HTTP Status: 429

Description: Request rate exceeds configured API limits. Implement proper rate limiting handling.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Too many requests in short time period
  • Missing rate limiting implementation in client
  • Inefficient API usage patterns
  • Multiple clients using same credentials
  • Burst traffic without proper throttling

💡 Solutions:

  • Implement exponential backoff retry strategy
  • Use request caching to reduce API calls
  • Implement request queuing and throttling
  • Review API usage patterns and optimize
  • Consider upgrading rate limit tier

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🟡 ERROR: E4001 - NETWORK_TIMEOUT
item.description:
Network Request Timeout

Department: Technology Department 💻 | Operations ⚙️

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 504

Description: Network request exceeded timeout duration, indicating connectivity or performance issues.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Slow network connection
  • Server overload or unresponsive
  • DNS resolution delays
  • Network congestion or packet loss
  • Insufficient timeout configuration

💡 Solutions:

  • Check network latency: ping fire22.ag
  • Test DNS resolution: nslookup fire22.ag
  • Increase request timeout settings appropriately
  • Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
  • Monitor network performance and routing

📞 Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | ops-manager@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Technology Department

item.title: 🔴 CRITICAL: E7001 - FIRE22_API_CONNECTION_FAILED
item.description:
Fire22 API Connection Failed

Department: Operations Department ⚙️ | Technology Department 💻

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to connect to Fire22 sportsbook API, preventing betting operations and data sync.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Fire22 API server downtime or maintenance
  • Invalid Fire22 API credentials
  • Network connectivity to fire22.ag domain
  • DNS resolution issues for Fire22 endpoints
  • Fire22 API rate limiting or blocking

💡 Solutions:

  • Check Fire22 API status: curl https://api.fire22.ag/health
  • Verify Fire22 credentials and authentication
  • Test DNS resolution: nslookup api.fire22.ag
  • Check API rate limits and quotas
  • Monitor Fire22 service status page

🚨 Business Impact: Sportsbook operations disrupted

📞 Contact: ops-manager@fire22.ag | tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Operations Department

item.title: 🟡 ERROR: E8001 - TELEGRAM_BOT_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
item.description:
Telegram Bot Authentication Failed

Department: Customer Support Department 🎧 | Technology Department 💻

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Telegram bot token is invalid or expired, preventing bot functionality and customer communication.

🔍 Common Causes:

  • Invalid or expired Telegram bot token
  • Bot token revoked by Telegram
  • Incorrect bot token configuration
  • Network connectivity to Telegram API
  • Telegram API service disruption

💡 Solutions:

  • Verify bot token: curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TOKEN/getMe
  • Regenerate bot token if compromised via @BotFather
  • Check bot token configuration and format
  • Test connectivity: ping api.telegram.org
  • Monitor Telegram API status

🚨 Customer Impact: Bot notifications and support disabled

📞 Contact: support@fire22.ag | tech-team@fire22.ag
item.dc:creator: Fire22 Customer Support Department

item.title: 📊 Fire22 Dashboard - Error Code Registry Information
item.description:
🔧 Error Code Registry System

This RSS feed provides real-time updates for Fire22 Dashboard error codes, departmental assignments, and troubleshooting information.

📈 System Statistics:

  • Total Error Codes: 9 documented
  • Departments Involved: 3 (Technology, Operations, Customer Support)
  • Severity Levels: Critical (3), Error (4), Warning (2)
  • Last Updated: January 28, 2025

🏢 Departmental Responsibilities:

  • Technology Department 💻: System, Database, API, Network errors
  • Operations Department ⚙️: Fire22 integration, business processes
  • Customer Support Department 🎧: Telegram bot, user communications

🔗 Resources:

  • Complete Error Registry (JSON)
  • Error Code Documentation Links
  • Department Information
  • Fire22 API Documentation

🔄 Feed Updates: This RSS feed is updated automatically when new error codes are added or existing codes are modified.

📞 Technical Support: tech-team@fire22.ag

⚙️ Operations Support: ops-manager@fire22.ag
